description: **Respect all members** - Treat everyone with kindness and respect. No harassment, bullying, or discriminatory language will be tolerated.
**No spam or excessive messages** - Avoid sending repetitive messages, excessive emojis, or flooding channels with unnecessary content.
**Keep conversations in appropriate channels** - Use designated channels for their intended purposes. General chat goes in general, memes in meme channels, etc.
**No NSFW content** - This server is meant to be appropriate for all ages. No sexual, violent, or otherwise inappropriate content.
**No advertising or self-promotion** - Don't advertise other Discord servers, social media, or personal projects without permission from moderators.
**Use appropriate usernames and avatars** - Your username and profile picture should be appropriate and not offensive or misleading.
**No doxxing or sharing personal information** - Never share someone else's personal information without their consent. This includes real names, addresses, phone numbers, etc.
**Follow Discord's Terms of Service** - All Discord ToS rules apply here. This includes age restrictions (13+) and prohibited content guidelines.
**No ban evasion** - Creating alternate accounts to bypass bans will result in all accounts being permanently banned.
**Listen to moderators** - When a moderator asks you to stop doing something or change your behavior, please comply. Arguing with moderation decisions should be done in DMs.
